definition: abbr. for 參議院|参议院[can1 yi4 yuan4], senate/upper chamber (of legislative assembly)
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: Who is the Senate Majority Leader now?
sentences.chinese: 現任國會參院多數黨領袖是誰？

sentences.english: We were on the ever of a partisan Senate inquisition.
sentences.chinese: 我們正處在有黨派偏見的參院調查的前夕。
